scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/code && mkdir dist/code && echo "cleaned dist/code"
scripts.build: yarn tmp-compile-linux-pre && yarn clean && yarn clean-zip && yarn compile && yarn zip && echo "zipped node"
scripts.compile-windows: v ./src/ -embed_vlib -os windows && mv ./src/src.exe ./dist/code/node-windows.exe && echo "compiled for windows"
scripts.compile-linux: v -os linux ./src/ && mv ./src/src ./dist/code/node-linux && echo "compiled for linux"
scripts.tmp-compile-linux-pre: mkdir ./tmp && mv ./dist/code/node-linux ./tmp/node-linux && echo "Moved Linux exec to a temp folder"
scripts.tmp-compile-linux-post: mv ./tmp/node-linux ./dist/code/node-linux && rm -rf ./tmp && echo "Moved linux exec back"
scripts.compile: yarn compile-mac && yarn compile-windows && yarn tmp-compile-linux-post
